props.active: Determines whether the chip is visible or not
props.closeIcon: Change the default icon used for **close** chips
props.closeLabel: Text used for *aria-label* on the close button in **close** chips. Can also be customized globally in [Internationalization](/customization/internationalization)
props.filter: Displays a selection icon when selected
props.filterIcon: Change the default icon used for **filter** chips
props.inputValue: Controls the **active** state of the item. This is typically used to highlight the component
props.label: Removes circle edges
props.link: Explicitly define the chip as a link
props.outlined: Removes background and applies border and text color
props.value: The value used when a child of a [v-chip-group](/components/chip-groups)
props.appendAvatar: Appends a v-avatar component to the header
props.appendIcon: Adds an icon after the default slot content
props.closable: Adds remove button and then a chip can be closed
props.prependAvatar: Prepends a v-avatar component to the header
props.prependIcon: Adds an icon before the default slot content

events.click: Emitted when component is clicked, toggles chip if contained in a chip group - Will trigger component to ripple when clicked unless the `.native` modifier is used
events.click:close: Emitted when close icon is clicked
